From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Alain Berliner (born 21 February 1963) is a Belgian director best known for the 1997 film Ma vie en rose, which won the Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign Language Film at the 55th Golden Globe Awards in 1998.
